brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of FTY720 in Adult Patients Who Receive a Kidney Transplant
brief_summary: The safety and efficacy of FTY720 is being evaluated in patients who receive a kidney transplant.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Patients undergoing their first kidney transplant - Male or female age 18 to 65 years Exclusion Criteria: - Patients in need of second kidney transplant or multi-organ transplants.
